text:
Hi! I have a problem that I am working on makeing Excel file with marco from 
Java using the POI
but I don't know How to make Excel file with Marco
Is it possible that makes Excel file with Marco from Java using the POI?
if possible that can anyone give me your advance!!!
thanks in advance!!!
have nice day!!!
creator: orangesource@daum.net
glens@apache.org
text:
POI does not currently support this.  It should be possible to read macros and
rewrite them but not to create them.  Please use the mailing list for questions.
 Bugzilla is for bugs.

creator: glens@apache.org
text: *** Bug 30930 has been marked as a duplicate of this bug. ***
